title: Ookina Furudokei (1973)
synopsis: The second release of the Japanese version of the 1876 song My Grandfather's Clock by American composer and songwriter Henry Clay Work that was broadcast on NHK's Minna no Uta program. It was again performed by Sumito Tachikawa and the Nagato Miho Kagekidan Jidou Gasshoudan (Miho Nagato Opera Children's Choir), but this time featured animation by Yoshiyuki Takeguchi.

title: Ookina Furudokei (2002)
synopsis: The third release of the Japanese version of the 1876 song My Grandfather's Clock by American composer and songwriter Henry Clay Work that was broadcast on NHK's Minna no Uta program. It was performed by Ken Hirai and featured artwork by Masaki Shiota that was animated by Three-d.

title: Tokyo Babylon 2021
synopsis: Subaru Sumeragi is the thirteenth head of his powerful onmyouji clan. Until the time comes when he must succeed his grandmother fully, Subaru is allowed to live in Tokyo with his fraternal twin Hokuto. While Subaru is kind and shy, Hokuto has exuberance to spare, and her favorite pastime is designing bold matching outfits for the two of them to wear. Her next favorite thing to do is try to set up Subaru with their veterinarian friend Seishirou Sakurazuka who, oddly enough, is always readily available to accompany the Sumeragis throughout the city. Subaru has to resolve a variety of spiritual conflicts in Tokyo: some are cases formally brought to him by clients, and others are matters in which he decides to involve himself. A selfless teenager, he empathizes with others to the point that their pain may as well be his own. This leaves him vulnerable in a city where nearly everyone makes decisions that only benefit themselves as individuals. Hokuto hopes that if Subaru develops feelings for Seishirou, their relationship will be the one thing that he never gives up for the sake of anyone else. However, is Seishirou the best candidate for her brother's love, or is he hiding sinister secrets?

title: Your Lie in April
synopsis: A piano prodigy who lost his ability to play after suffering a traumatic event in his childhood is forced back into the spotlight by an eccentric girl with a secret of her own. The story follows Arima Kousei, a skilled pianist.
background: Your Lie in April, known in Japan as Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso (四月は君の嘘) or Kimiuso for short, is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Naoshi Arakawa. The series was serialized in Kodansha's Monthly Shōnen Magazine from April 2011 to May 2015. An anime television series adaptation by A-1 Pictures aired from October 2014 to March 2015 on Fuji TV's Noitamina block.A live-action film adaptation of the same name was released in September 2016.

title: Baxian Yu Tiaozao
synopsis: The film tells that when the Eight Immortals crossed the East China Sea, the Dragon King tried to stop. The Eight Immortals beat the Dragon King. The Dragon King turned into a dragon boat and sent the Eight Immortals across the sea to Penglai. After landing, when the Eight Immortals were resting in a hotel, a flea jumped out, disturbing the Eight Immortals. The immortals were furious and took out all kinds of magic weapons to kill the flea, but the fleas were still safe and sound. Just as the Eight Immortals looked at the flea helplessly, the noise disturbed the shop waiter. I saw the shop waiter holding the flea in her palm and squeezing it gently to subdue the flea. After seeing the Eight Immortals, they couldn't help being surprised...(source:wikipedia)

title: Qiyi De Menggu Ma
synopsis: EP1:Inner Mongolian boy Bayut accidentally discovered the endangered Mongolian wild horse, and developed friendship with the head horse Daki among them. After hearing the news, Professor James of the Welsh Nature Reserve in England, together with his assistant Peter and his granddaughter Kitty, came to Inner Mongolia to send the horse. Accompanied by Bayut’s father Keely (the ranch director), they selected Daji and brought Daji back. Domesticated in Britain. When Bayute saw Daji, who had been with him day and night, leave, tears filled his eyes. 　ep2　 After Mongolian Madaji was sent to the British Nature Reserve to be domesticated, he still missed his hometown-Inner Mongolia grassland. On a stormy night, it broke through the stables and escaped the sanctuary, and was sold to the French slaughterhouse by horse dealers. The reserve professor James and his granddaughter Kitty rushed to France to rescue Dagi. Daji fought hard with the workers at the slaughterhouse, and finally broke through the iron cage in which it was held and ran to freedom.(translated from douban)

title: Shu Ke He Beita
synopsis: Beta is a pet rat. He often drives his little tank against the tabby cat who always bullies him. Shuke is a little mouse living in the jungle. He got it by accident. A small helicopter. After having a helicopter, Shuke often drove it flying around in the jungle to help his friends. Finally, Beta was tired of staying at home all day, and decided to drive his tank out into the world. 　　 One morning, Beta set off. When his tank came to the jungle, he found Shuke's helicopter. The two handed over. After a great battle, the two finally shook hands and made peace and became good friends. This good partner in sea and air combat began their adventure!(translated from douban)

title: Ai Ni
synopsis: Two vendors, one old and one young, sit on both sides of a big tree and sell apples. The apples sold by the old are big and red, and the apples sold by the young look good. In fact, there are many holes. With a kind face, customers gradually flocked to the old man's booth. In order to sell the apples, the young man lowered the price and re-placed the apples, showing only the good side. This really attracted many customers. When the two returned home by ferry after doing business, the young people tried to take advantage of the old people everywhere. When the ferry was interrupted by a rush of waves, the two and the boatman fell into the water. The old man felt that the purse was too heavy and discarded it. The young man hurriedly picked it up regardless of his life.(source:douban)

title: Zhong Shu
synopsis: Fatty, tall and short are three lazy brothers, and the three of them went to plant trees together this day. But they don't understand the division of labor and cooperation. The tall guys dig diligently, while the fat and short guys are lazy on the side. The taller digs the hole, and the short one arbitrarily inserts the saplings, but because the digging depth varies, the roots of the saplings cannot enter the soil. The fat man watered the water immediately, but took a leaky scoop, and the sapling only drank a few drops of water. Soon the sapling dried out. But the three of them didn't learn their lesson, and continued to plant trees like this, and made various jokes. The harvest day came, and the three brothers began to reflect on seeing others harvest basket after basket of fruit.(translated from douban)

title: Qi Niu Nan Xia
synopsis: When a few children were concentrating on fishing by the river, the naughty Beibei threw a stone over, not only scared off the fish that immediately took the bait, but the children were also wet by the stirring water, and they were so angry that they wanted to catch the shellfish. Betha was angry, but failed. 　　 Beibei was winking at his friends triumphantly. A cow distracted him again. He hurriedly rode on and started teasing the cow, but no matter how he slapped it, the cow did not move. Now, it was his turn to be laughed at by his friends. Suddenly, the cow ran up, and Beibei became proud again under the surprised gaze of his friends, but this cow did not know to stop when he ran, and Beibei was anxious.(translated from douban)

title: Dongtian Li De Xiaotian Shu
synopsis: Tiantian is a little field mouse very different from its siblings. When they are busy stocking up food and straw, it focuses on collecting warm sunlight, colorful colors and beautiful sounds, and puts it They are treated like babies—it hopes that these babies can help the whole family in the winter to drive away the severe cold. Naturally, this idea is laughed at by brothers and sisters, but Tiantian disagrees, because there is grandma supporting it. 　　Winter is here, sweet brothers and sisters all find the life very boring, they pester grandma to want this time, grandma thinks of sweet collected baby. When Tiantian took out the baby to share with the whole family, the family did indeed get a warm winter that was different from the past, as it once imagined.(translated from douban)

title: Lu He Niu
synopsis: When deer, ox and birds were drinking and playing by the pond, a snake came to them quietly. It wanted to attack the deer and ox, but it was pulled into two by the two "brothers"-the lion of the forest When you want to put the deer in your bag, they also become defeated by their concerted efforts. However, when the deer and the ox gathered at the pond again, they turned from friends into strangers who ignored each other because of the little water resources, which gave the lion a chance. (translated from douban)

title: Mofang Dasha
synopsis: Lake, a sixth-grade elementary school student, faces severe exams and his parents have always been strict in discipline, so he can only study at home and cannot play with the children in the vast world. On this day, Lake was punished by his mother, and he was so angry that the toy Rubik's cube was exasperated. Unexpectedly, the Rubik's cube hit by the impact turned out to emit light, getting bigger and bigger, and finally turned into a tall and tall skyscraper. Under the wrong circumstances, Lake broke into the Rubik's Cube Building and saw the fragile and beautiful glass city, the children's kingdom ruled by children, and experienced fierce war in the insect kingdom. His expeditions go to heaven and earth, and he is constantly surprised, but how can he find his way home? (translated from douban)
background: This anime end aired in 1994. There were 26 episodes in this anime planned but only 10 episodes finished.This anime won Second Prize of the 2nd China Film and Television Animation Exhibition, 1993 Outstanding Film Award of the Ministry of Radio, Film and Television.

title: Tebie Chedui

title: Yinshen Tan Zhang
synopsis: The first episode "Dream Flower" 　　 The fox and the one-eyed wolf made poisonous chocolates from fantasy flowers, and the animals became addicted to drugs after eating Liang. The stealth inspector used a clever trick to punish the one-eyed wolf and the fox, and rescued the animals. 　　 Episode 2 "Dinosaur Egg" 　　 The cunning fox created the "cosmic dinosaur egg" incident, causing panic. It not only peddled anti-dinosaur items, but also wanted to seize power to become the mayor. A letter from the invisible inspector exposed the fox's conspiracy.(translated from douban)

title: Kuai Yue Jia Jia Che
synopsis: In a big flying caravan, three friends lived. They were lively, cheerful and helpful dragon-jumping children, Qiuqiu children who were gentle and kind and "good students" in the class, as well as honest and simple but a little lazy Snoring children, and the RV they live in is affectionately called "Happy Family Car". Every day, they drove the "Happy Family Car" to school, all kinds of interesting things happened between the teachers and classmates in the school, and they grew up happily.(translated from douban)

title: Xingxing Tan Zhang
synopsis: 88 Watermelon Street was originally a dilapidated house that was old and in disrepair. Not long ago, the owner of the house demolished the ruined house and rebuilt a beautiful dome hut. However, now the Big Bear has used up all the money, but there is still a shortage of money to install the gate. The slap bear borrowed money from door to door along the street, and everyone refused to lend him money. It turns out that the credibility of the big slap bear is not good, and he was shameless.(douban)

title: Xiao Jingling Hui Dou
synopsis: Three thousand years ago, Monkey King led the Heavenly Soldiers and Heavenly Generals to capture all the fairies in the bottomless pit, and the elf Grey Bean (Voice of the Epoch Times) caught in the crevice of the stone was left behind. Many years later, the gray beans popped out of the cracks in the rock and got their eyes crooked. Grey Bean realizes that his ancestors have done a lot of bad things, and it wants to be reborn as a kind-hearted child. It meets the fat tail of Zhu Bajie who can change thirty-two (voiced by Zhang Meijuan). The Big Mouth monster wants to eat the little rabbit. To save the little rabbit, Grey Bean and Fatty beat the big mouth monster away. The rescued little rabbit saw Grey Bean but screamed a bad goblin and ran away scaredly. Fatty encourages gray beans who are not understood but sad. As long as they insist on doing good deeds, one day they will be understood. The Big Mouth dirty the moon, and Grey Bean risked his life to wash the moon clean. Once Huidou and Fatty discovered that Little Golden Dragon had no eyes under the water. In sympathy for Little Golden Dragon, he lit eyes for Little Golden Dragon, but his own eyes were crooked, which made others' eyes crooked. Although it is often misunderstood and not understood, Huidou will continue to do a lot of good things for everyone with his good friend Fatty...(translated from douban)
background: This anime aired in 1998.This anime won Animation Golden Boy Award First Prize.

title: Semi wa Magic Cube
synopsis: The story tells the tale of Semi, a bright girl who goes in a magical time journey with the genius teacher Wai, in order to prevent the evil X from utilizing the powers of the magic cube for evil. Along the way, Semi and her math school friends run into history and math problems that they must solve with logic and wit. (Source: hobbykr)

title: Scott Pilgrim Vs. The World
synopsis: As bass guitarist for a garage-rock band, Scott Pilgrim (Michael Cera) has never had trouble getting a girlfriend; usually, the problem is getting rid of them. But when Ramona Flowers (Mary Elizabeth Winstead) skates into his heart, he finds she has the most troublesome baggage of all: an army of ex-boyfriends who will stop at nothing to eliminate him from her list of suitors.

title: Kumo
synopsis: Music video for the song Kumo by Tarou Masuda that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Akira Maeda.

title: Boku no Nikkichou
synopsis: Music video for the song Boku no Nikkichou by Ichiro Ogura that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Akira Katou.

title: Tenkuu Shinpan
synopsis: Upon witnessing a man's head cracked open with an axe, 16-year-old Yuri Honjou trembles in fear and confusion as she flees from the masked assailant, only to find out she's trapped in an abandoned building where every door is mysteriously locked. Desperately searching for a way out, Yuri runs to the rooftop, but a world with no signs of life stands before her, surrounded by high-rise buildings. Though filled with despair, once she learns that her brother is also in this strange place, Yuri is determined to find him and escape. However, she soon finds that there are more masked murderers in the area, anxious to terrorize their newfound victims and satiate their sickest desires, leaving Yuri to question if they will be able to make it out alive.

title: Kageki Shoujo!!
synopsis: Founded in the Taisho era, the "Red Flower Opera Company" attracts people's hearts across generations on a beautiful and gorgeous stage created only by unmarried women. The 100th generation students who have passed through a high magnification and entered the "Red Flower Opera Music School" to develop the human resources. Sarasa Watanabe, an innocent girl with a height of 178 cm who longs for "Oscar-sama." Ai Narada, a former national idol who is indifferent to everything, both dreams and friends. The music school life full of hope and conflict, where everything is disjointed, is about to begin!  (Source: MAL News)

title: Gokushufudou
synopsis: "Immortal Tatsu," the legendary yakuza who single-handedly defeated a rival gang with a lead pipe, is a name known to strike fear in both hardened police officers and vicious criminals. Soon after his sudden disappearance, he resurfaces with a slight change in profession. Now equipped with an apron, Tatsu has given up violence and is trying to make an honest living as a house husband. While adapting to mundane household tasks, Tatsu finds that being a house husband has its own challenges, from the battlefield known as supermarket sales to failures in the kitchen. Despite living peacefully, misunderstandings seem to follow him left and right. Gokushufudou follows the daily life of the comically serious ex-yakuza as he leaves behind his dangerous previous life to become a stay-at-home husband.

details.Synonyms: The Way of the House Husband

title: Thermae Romae Novae
synopsis: Lucius Modestus, an ancient Roman architect, finds himself job-hunting due to having trouble coming up with new ideas. As his demeanor and personality become dismal, his friends try taking him to a bathhouse for him to relax. Unable to unwind in the bustling and crowded bath, Lucius dips his head in the water. Down there, he finds a secret tunnel that transports him to a modern-day Japanese bathhouse, providing him the inspiration he needed to make a new creation. Loaded with what seems to be knowledge way ahead of his time, Lucius does his best to try and recreate his findings, usually inferior in quality due to his circumstances. However, the sheer ingenuity may be just enough to gain the attention of the citizens and regain his reputation as an architect.

details.Japanese: テルマエ・ロマエ ノヴァエ

title: Rilakkuma to Yuuenchi
synopsis: Grab your tickets and get in line for a new series of stop-motion adventures with Rilakkuma and Kaoru! Join Rilakkuma, Korilakkuma, Kiiroitori, and Kaoru as they explore an amusement park in its closing hours when Rilakkuma's Theme Park Adventure arrives next year. (Source: Netflix)

title: BEELZEBUZ
synopsis: A music video for Fake Type.'s song Beelzebuz

title: Bad Mood
synopsis: The shorts follow The Pink Elephants, a fictional band with five members: Fishman, Butt, Rabbit, UFO, and Moth. The shorts depict the havoc in their daily lives. (Source: ANN)

title: Yasuke
synopsis: A village in danger, a mysterious child, warring daimyo, and the greatest ronin never known all clash in a Japan of magic and mechs. Learn the story of the first African samurai. (Source: Netflix)
